sentences.en: He reached the semis after beating Nadal in the quarterfinal.
sentences.cn: 他在四分之一决赛中击败纳达尔后进入了半决赛。

sentences.en: In Tuesday's other quarterfinal first-leg tie, Mourinho's former club Inter Milan will continue their title defense against German club Schalke.
sentences.cn: 周二的另一场8强首回合比赛，穆里尼奥之前的俱乐部国际米兰将会继续他们的卫冕之路，对战德国俱乐部沙尔克。

sentences.en: On July 10, 2011, in the Brazil quarterfinal against the United States, American player Abby Wambach caught a ball sideways and smoothly entered the overtime.
sentences.cn: 2011年7月10日，在巴西对战美国的四分之一决赛中，美国队的球员 Abby Wambach 侧身接住了一个球，并顺利进入加时赛。
